title: Alan Fletcher at the Design Museum, London
content:
Not as many photos as I thought, I’m afraid.

This (from 1960)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/web003_6187.jpg)
caught my eye, because it reminded me of this 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BE_5061.gif)
(c. 2006) that I have to make badges of next week. 

I think we’ve probably had some of these on the Type ID board

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/web004_3616.jpg)

Facsimile (full size, wall painting) of the gates from Fletcher’s home

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/web005_5846.jpg)

And a very cool collage of objects from a junk hoard

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/web007_4048.jpg)
author: Richard Hards
